#summary Installing EasyGSP as Service

= Linux =

There is a start up script @ $EASYGSP_HOME/bin/easygsp. Open and modify paths as needed.

Copy to service directory
{{{
  $  cp $EASYGSP_HOME/bin/easygsp /etc/init.d/easygsp
}}}

Fedora users can install service using chkconfig
{{{
  $  chkconfig --add easygsp
  $  chkconfig --level 23 easygsp on
}}}

*Start service*
{{{
  $  service easygsp start
}}}


EasyGSP can be start using the start script
{{{
$ cd $EASYGSP_HOME/bin
$ ./start.sh
}}}


To Stop
{{{
$ cd $EASYGSP_HOME/bin
$ ./stop.sh
}}}





= Windows= 

To Install as Service
$EASYGSP_HOME/bin/easygsp is a startup script that may be to start EasyGSP as a service
open and modify as needed
For Windows
To start from the command line,
> cd %EASYGSP_HOME%\bin
> EasyGSP.bat


To Stop
> cd %EASYGSP_HOME%\bin
> stop.bat

To Install as Service
> cd %EASYGSP_HOME%\bin
> InstallEasyGSP-NT.bat


To Remove as Service
> cd %EASYGSP_HOME%\bin
> UninstallEasyGSP-NT.bat
